original_title: The Mystery of Carl E. Lafong
overview: They are:  1) a man in a house (see N 째 3)  2) a radio  3) a man who is fascinated by short waves (see N 째 8)  4) love songs, songs war  5) languages, songs, tribes  6) antennas, transmissions, frequency  7) remote voice  8) death (see No. 11)  9) the kilohertz, megahertz, numbers (see N 째 6)  10) the mask of God, the mask of the Devil and the veil between the two (see N 째 4)
title: The Mystery of Carl E. Lafong
